data.title: Oak Lawn Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Our families and their guests are treated with the highest level of professionalism, dignity and respect. Oak Lawn’s staff is committed to caring for each and every individual, as if he or she were our own beloved family member… before, during and after the time of need.
data.text:
Our families and their guests are treated with the highest level of professionalism, dignity and respect. Oak Lawn’s staff is committed to caring for each and every individual, as if he or she were our own beloved family member… before, during and after the time of need.

Traditional values, elegance and integrity are the hallmarks of superior services offered at Oak Lawn Funeral Home. Brittany Agee, manager and the staff ensures that Oak Lawn Funeral Home provides superior service and support. We are here to advise you on all of your options and provide you with as much information as you need to make informed decisions and arrangements for your loved one.

We are proud to be a part of the Signature Services family.

Are you looking to add a personal touch to your loved one's funeral service? Would you like to browse through our catalog of viewing merchandise? Maybe you want to learn more about planning your own funeral. We've made all of this information — and more — available for you to explore in the comfort and privacy of your home.

Our experience has taught us that when losing a loved one, those left behind feel lost and alone. Many do not know where to turn to or how to cope. Our grief support programs in place are dedicated to helping you during your difficult time and making each day a little easier for you when a loved one is lost.
